mapper.select: select * from asset_repayment_detail where asset_repayment_id = #{ID} and status in (2,30)
select * from user_card_info where user_id = #{USER_ID} limit 1

select count(0) as orderCount, sum(r.repayment_amount) as principal, DATE_FORMAT(r.repayment_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as repaymentTime from asset_repayment r LEFT JOIN asset_borrow_order o ON r.asset_order_id = o.id where r.repayment_time>=#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and r.repayment_time<#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and o.merchant_number = #{merchantNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(repayment_time,'%Y-%m-%d')
select id,money_amount,loan_interests,loan_time,loan_end_time,realname,user_phone,status,ifnull(merchant_number,0) AS merchant_number from asset_borrow_order where id = #{loanId} and status= 21
